title: ISketchPatternFeatureData.GeometryPattern
description: Gets or sets whether to create the pattern using only the geometry (faces and edges) of the feature.
returns: True to create the pattern using only the geometry of the feature, false to pattern the entire feature
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISketchPatternFeatureData::BodyPattern
is false.
If this property is set to true, you can call
ISketchPatternFeatureData::SetFeatureScope
.
For more information, see the
Sketch Driven Patterns
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Help.
